summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Notification of unquoted equity securities issuance (performance rights) under employee incentive scheme.  
- **Securities Issued**: **10,981,158 performance rights** (ASX code: BGLAB), issued on **07/08/2025**.  
- **Key Management Personnel (KMP) Allocation**: **729,043 performance rights** issued to Guy Moore.  
- **Total Unquoted Performance Rights Outstanding**: **43,680,275** (post-issue).  
- **Listing Rule Exception**: Issued under **LR 7.2 Exception 13** (no shareholder approval required).  
- **Ordinary Shares Outstanding**: **1,476,326,107** (quoted, unchanged).  
- **Terms Reference**: [Employee incentive scheme terms](https://announcements.asx.com.au/asxpdf/20221018/pdf/45gdlr8mtg13cp.pdf).  

**Material Impact**: Dilutionary potential from performance rights (conditional equity), but no immediate trading impact (unquoted securities).
